wrath.client.graphics

Class Texture

  • java.lang.Object
    • wrath.client.graphics.Texture
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    wrath.common.Closeable, wrath.common.Reloadable

    public class Texture
extends java.lang.Object
implements wrath.common.Closeable, wrath.common.Reloadable
    Class to describe and load Textures (both 2D and 3D).

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void bindTexture()
      Sets the OpenGL Texture state to point to this texture.
      void close() 
      void destroyTexture()
      Permanently removes the Texture from the game assets.
      java.io.File getTextureFile()
      Gets the File that the texture was loaded from.
      int getTextureID()
      Gets the OpenGL integer ID of the texture.
      void reload() 
      void setAntiAliasing(boolean enabled)
      Toggles Anti-Aliasing filters for this Texture.
      void unbindTexture()
      Sets the current OpenGL texture to point to nothing.
      static void unbindTextures()
      Sets all current OpenGL textures to point to nothing.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Texture

        public Texture(java.io.File textureFile)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        textureFile - The image File to load the texture from.

      • Texture

        public Texture(java.io.File textureFile,
               boolean antiAliasing)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        textureFile - The image File to load the texture from.
        antiAliasing - If true, this Texture will go through Anti-Aliasing filtering.

    • Method Detail

      • bindTexture

        public void bindTexture()
        Sets the OpenGL Texture state to point to this texture. This should not be called by the developer as it is done automatically.

      • close

        public void close()
        Specified by:
        close in interface wrath.common.Closeable

      • destroyTexture

        public void destroyTexture()
        Permanently removes the Texture from the game assets.

      • getTextureFile

        public java.io.File getTextureFile()
        Gets the File that the texture was loaded from.
        Returns:
        Returns the File that the texture was loaded from.

      • getTextureID

        public int getTextureID()
        Gets the OpenGL integer ID of the texture.
        Returns:
        Returns the OpenGL integer ID of the texture.

      • reload

        public void reload()
        Specified by:
        reload in interface wrath.common.Reloadable

      • setAntiAliasing

        public void setAntiAliasing(boolean enabled)
        Toggles Anti-Aliasing filters for this Texture.
        Parameters:
        enabled - If true, enables Anti-Aliasing.

      • unbindTexture

        public void unbindTexture()
        Sets the current OpenGL texture to point to nothing. This should not be called by the developer as it is done automatically.

      • unbindTextures

        public static void unbindTextures()
        Sets all current OpenGL textures to point to nothing. This should not be called by the developer as it is done automatically.
